title: Legend  of  Kyrandia  Series  GOG
description:
Title: Legend of Kyrandia Series
Genre: adventure / point&click / fantasy
Released: 
- Legend of Kyrandia: 1st January 1992
- Hand of Fate: 1st January 1993
- Malcolm's Revenge: 1st January 1994
Developer: Westwood Studios
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Description:
It began with the adventure of Brandon, the rightful heir to the throne left empty by treachery and murder. The first Legend of Kyrandia the hero comes of age during his travels, learns some essential magic spells, recovers a mystical artifact, and faces his parents' murderer. Years pass. Zanthia, a young female alchemist and wizard encountered in the first game, discovers that the kingdom of Kyrandia is in great danger. In The Legend of Kyrandia: Hand of Fate the land seems to be mysteriously disappearing, piece by piece. The beautiful heroine has to embark on a dangerous quest which will lead her to some unsettling discoveries. She will also find her one true love, whether she wants it or not - just in time to save his sorry behind. Finally, the story will come full circle and you'll see things from a whole new perspective. In The Legend of Kyrandia: Malcolm's Revenge the villain of the first story makes a comeback, and this time he has to make it without his magical powers. Is he really the murdering maniac we thought he was, or just a regular maniac with no blood on his hands?

How to play:
1) Run the setup executables for each game, located in their respective folders;
2) Launch the games using their desktop or Start menu shortcuts.

If you like these games, BUY them!
